name: Snorb
description:
press Z to access the menu and change the visualization

control with: left mouse button, right mouse button, middle-mouse-click OR X button (they do the same thing), middle mouse scroll

TO SAVE A LOOPING GIF:
The timing settings let you save looping gifs of any length (up to 16s). If `gif_record` is true, scroll on the `loop_counter` setting to reset the loop, clear the display, disable the menu, and start recording. When finished a little popup will appear with your gif.

find me on twitter @aebrer for more info
